title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?

Madrid

Draper, Musetti, Arnaldi, Diallo win on action-packed Wednesday

April 30, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Mutua Madrid Open is the fourth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Wednesday, when tenth seed Lorenzo Musetti ousted sixth seed Alex de Minaur to march into the quarter-finals. Jack Draper, Matteo Arnaldi and Gabriel Diallo were among those who advanced.

View all the Madrid results from Wednesday below.

Results - Wednesday, 30 April 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 16
ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) d [11] Tommy Paul (USA) 62 62
ATP - [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [6] Alex de Minaur (AUS) 64 62
ATP - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) d [16] Frances Tiafoe (USA) 63 75
ATP - [LL] Gabriel Diallo (CAN) d [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) 57 76(7) 64

Men's Doubles - Round of 16
ATP - [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN)/Henry Patten (GBR) d Alexander Erler (AUT)/Constantin Frantzen (GER) 64 64
ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA)/Mate Pavic (CRO) d Jamie Murray (GBR)/Rajeev Ram (USA) 61 36 10-4
ATP - Christian Harrison (USA)/Evan King (USA) d Joe Salisbury (GBR)/Neal Skupski (GBR) 63 75
ATP - Maximo Gonzalez (ARG)/Andres Molteni (ARG) d Rohan Bopanna (IND)/Ben Shelton (USA) 64 67(5) 11-9
ATP - [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER)/Tim Puetz (GER) d Andre Goransson (SWE)/Sem Verbeek (NED) 67(6) 75 10-7
